Articles.Content: Hey guys I'm starting a new series on my channel and this is my first episode! Give me suggestions for my next episode. In this episode I just had a suborbital flight and talked about ksp.

Here's a suggestion: I see a lot people decide to make a video, then start recording, and then ask what they should make videos about. Strikes me that this is backwards. I suspect that your videos will get more attention if you decide what you want to present to people, plan out how to present it, then concentrate on the point you want to make and edit out the slow parts. Anyway, those are the kind of videos I like to watch.
